name: Capsule Jump (itch) (Funtajii, crazeds, Jan2L)
description:
just a silly little game about a silly little capsule that jumps

There are 3 levels.

  • WASD to move
  • Spacebar to jump

Sometimes the capsule will get stuck on walls, don't worry about that though he's just being quirky :)

Credits:

Assets: https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/pixel-adventure-1
